## CookiePermanentStorageService.set() method

Sets value that will be stored with 'name'e in permanent storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(name: string, value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name with which will be value stored |
|  value | any | Value to be stored |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
